label: Hubert Home 9
description:
Hubert pulls open the door on the box, and puts a single silver ticket into it.  And then says the destination out loud: "John Thomas, Cerulea.  Benny Wonky Chocolate Bar. -- Oh inside the wrapper!"  Hubert then just waits.
While gazing into the crystal ball, Hubert notices John working at the library...

Hit 1 to continue.
Hit 0 to quit.
